title: Taiwan tube-nosed bat
text:
The Taiwan tube-nosed bat ("Murina puta") is a species of <a href="vesper%20bat">vesper bat</a> in the family <a href="Vespertilionidae">Vespertilionidae</a>.
It is found only in <a href="Taiwan">Taiwan</a>. It is a close relative of <a href="Hutton%27s%20tube-nosed%20bat">Hutton's tube-nosed bat</a>, and might even be the same species.
